title: Force exerted and time leads to

content.question: If one knows only the constant resultant force acting on an object and the time during which this force acts, one can determine the

choices.label: change in momentum of the object
change in velocity of the object
change in kinetic energy of the object

content.answer: change in momentum of the object

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
